name: Lovebird (Caroline Wang, Richard Cheng, VicF, DaphneFerreiro, Emily Pitcher, cathythecatx, chosuh, ✧⁺ megan xu ⁺✧)
name_original: Lovebird (Caroline Wang, Richard Cheng, VicF, DaphneFerreiro, Emily Pitcher, cathythecatx, chosuh, ✧⁺ megan xu ⁺✧)
description:
Meet Lume, a heartfelt lovebird who has lost their song, as they start new beginnings and settle down in their new home in Viridia. Lovebird is a 2D narrative RPG that features five vibrant islands and a line up of lively creatures for you to explore and befriend as you complete quests, fish and farm! Earn your feathers as you grow and heal through helping your newfound friends with their dreams.

Credits:

  • Caroline Wang - Team Lead, Artist, UI/UX Designer
  • Richard Cheng - Team Lead, Programmer
  • Megan Xu - Artist
  • Cathy Zhang - Musician / Sound Designer, Writer
  • Daphne Ferreiro - Musician / Sound Designer, Programmer
  • Sophia Choi - Artist
  • Alena Zhu - Animator
  • Victor Fang - Programmer
  • Emily Pitcher - Writer
  • Karen Li - UI/UX Designer
